item.title: Statistical Machine Learning
item.description: coming soon. this is a test. #the-canvas { border: 1px solid black; direction: ltr; width: 100%; height: auto; } #paginator{ text-align: center; margin-bottom: 10px; } Previous Next     Page: / window.onload = function() { var url = "https:\/\/noboru-murata.github.io\/" + '.\/pdfs\/brand-share.pdf'; var hidePaginator = ""; var pdfjsLib = window['pdfjs-dist/build/pdf']; pdfjsLib.GlobalWorkerOptions.workerSrc = "https:\/\/noboru-murata.github.io\/" + '/js/pdf-js/build/pdf.worker.js'; var pdfDoc = null, pageNum = 1, pageRendering = false, pageNumPending = null, scale = 3, canvas = document.
